name: Guardians of the Sanctree
description: You and allies, avian inhabitants of Sanctree City, build structures and production lines on the tree, crafting weapons to fend off subterranean insects. Defense is just the start—dig deeper, destroy nests, fortify new defenses against escalating threats for an impregnable stronghold.

name: Arid Arnold
description: Arid Arnold is a classic puzzle-platforming adventure, explore 9 unique worlds, travel in time, talk to racoons, go to hell and back in search of the fountain of water. In one world you might be rotating the entire level, but in the next you will need to travel in time, there’s even a few levels where you need to coordinate with a clone of yourself.

name: Shadows
description: Shadows is a very personal tribute to Death Bear's mapping origins and the journey they've been on the last four years. Shadows is a Vanilla Limit-Removing megawad, with Episode 1 inspired loosely by Knee Deep in the Dead. Each of the episodes follow similar themes as the original, with some personal flavor and some added twists.

name: Cargo-Bot
description: The puzzle game that challenges your brain and helps you learn programming concepts. Give instructions to a robot arm which moves crates to the right place. Have full control in 36 levels. Be logical, play Cargo-Bot.

name: Raid Gaza!
description: Raid Gaza! is a short real-time strategy Flash game by Marcus Richert which satirizes the Israel–Palestine conflict from a pro-Palestinian perspective.

name: The Last One and Then Another
description:
The Last and Then Another is a free standalone expansion to the narrative-driven experience HOW FISH IS MADE.

"Your eyes will be my mouth. My fins will be your tongue. More is more is more is more! Devour your smallness! Fill the void!"

name: The Jackbox Survey Scramble
description: Discover how people across the country think! The Jackbox Survey Scramble is a collection of hilarious survey-based party games, using real one-word answers from real people. Really! Grab some friends and start guessing!

name: Murder Is Game Over: The Blackinton Curse
description: A new stand-alone murder mystery in the Murder Is Game Over series. Can you break the 150-year-old family curse before it claims another victim?

name: Cats Hiding in 3D
description: Explore the coastal town and find cats in this cute and relaxing searching game. Can you find all 100 of the hiding cats?

name: Black Dust
description: Explore a hand-drawn world of trash with your giant robot, trusty orb, and (lack of) platforming skills! These hostile lands will test your understand of many bizarre mechanics, and a complete exploration can only achieved by the most devoted of players.

name: Citadale: The Accursed Seal
description: The dark lord Rhogul is about to be resurrected and the only man capable of stopping him is dying. Explore a vast open world in this action game with metroidvania elements and join Arion Dorleac in his final days for one last time...

name: Retro Horror Story
description: Embark on a heart-pounding journey through a cursed maze in this thrilling survival horror game. Evade a terrifying monster and solve intricate puzzles to uncover dark secrets. Can you escape the nightmare?

name: Fossil Skater
description: A racing game where you ride dinosaurs who skate with car-shoes.

name: Idle Saga
description: Sin descripción

name: Cave Crawler 2
description: Cave Crawler 2 is a retro-inspired 2D side-scroller. Escape a series of winding caves full of strange creatures and treacherous platforming challenges.

name: Mullet Madjack: Deluxe Edition
description: Mullet Madjack is a single-player fast-paced FPS that brings you directly inside a classic anime. The DELUXE Edition contains Mullet Mad Jack GAME, an official ARTBOOK and OST SOUNDTRACKS !

name: Rival Stars Horse Racing
description:
Breed and train horses, manage your stable, and race to become a champion!
Whether you’re a fan of derby racing, animal games or pet horses, your exciting horse simulation journey begins with Rival Stars Horse Racing.

name: Hello Counsel
description: Hello Counsel is a short, romantic comedy visual novel that follows criminal sensation, Poise, who just got arrested! Good thing, her hot lawyer boyfriend Salem is here to help her avoid any jail time — only if she stops flirting with him, that is.

name: Piworld
description: First pixel 2D game, which include MMO and PVP system for anyone, who wants to try something new.

name: The Hand is Faster than the Eye
description: Ace Snapshot, and his partner Snap Aceshot, are down on their luck would-be criminals. They've decided to leave their mark by committing a heinous crime at the mayor's birthday party. Unfortunately, they also happen to be menaced by a giant, disembodied Hand, who is determined to put an end to their ambitions. Will Ace and Snap get away scot-free, or will they be caught... red-handed? It's all up to you!

name: Kraken Attack
description:
The Krakken has risen from the depths of the lake to wreak havoc! Help Ben send it back to where it came from!

Fire at the Krakken to wear down its energy, sending it back to the depths of the lake, before time runs out. Aim for the Krakken's chest for maximum damage. Watch out for the Krakken's fire especially the blue plasma bursts. Shoot them before they land in your path.

name: Solidarność
description:
Solidarność is a 1991 Polish strategy computer game developed by P.Z.Karen Co. under the direction of Przemysław Rokita and published by California Dreams. It was created by Polish programmers specifically for an American audience in order to support a Hollywood film about the life of Lech Wałęsa, which was never actualised.
Set in Poland in the 1980s, the player takes the role of the leader of an illegal union, and aims to gain more support in 7 regions than the Communists. The player achieves this through speeches, printing leaflets, organizing demonstrations and strikes.

name: Cosmic Payback
description:
EARTH, 2562 A.D.

After centuries of war and suffering, peace slowly began to return to the world. Just as civilization had started to recover, however, another crisis fell upon it - an extra-terrestrial armada pillaged the earth, taking with them virtually all of the known supplies of gold. Society was plunged into chaos - financial markets experienced a recession of unparalleled proportions, electronics production ceased altogether, and people with dental fillings dared not wander out in public.

An international task force was created with the aim of recovering the gold. Scraping together what they could with the miniscule amount that had not been plundered, a shuttle was constructed that would serve justice upon the invaders. It contained a few spherical exploration pods, which would navigate the planetary surface by means of bouncing upon it.

You are responsible for piloting the pods and returning all of the gold to Earth. If this mission fails, humanity will be doomed to return to the Stone Age.

You are our only hope!

Bounce your way through fifteen levels of challenging gameplay and fast 3-D action with Cosmic Payback, for the 48K/128K ZX Spectrum.

name: june 18 2024 (White people in China)
description: Adapted from 'Wet Dreams Can Beta Demo' by 'Immortal'

name: Dinosaur Zookeeper
description:
Dinosaur Zookeeper is a casual management game about a zoo filled with dinosaurs. The game screen is divided in small tiles and the player gets to pick and place dinosaurs, and put a fence around them. Every day a certain number of visitors arrives and the player needs to make sure they do not get hurt when the dinosaurs break out of their fenced enclosure. For each day that the zoo survives without being run down by trampling dinos, the player receives income and gets access to new types of dinosaurs. After the first week new goals are offered when you do not put up new fences, make sure that less visitors die than the day before, or survive a PETA inspection. While placing the dinosaurs and putting down fences, the game is paused. When done, everything comes to life for about ten seconds and then a tally is made. Generally the player cannot interfere during those seconds, except with some emergency measures.

Each dino has specific characteristics. Some can sit together, while others need to stay away from each other. Certain dinosaurs need lots of space and others get angry when too many fences surround them. Once they get angry, they knock down fences, attack other dinosaurs and eat visitors. When this happens too often, the game is over. Money can be spent on upgrades:* One-Shot gun: emergency tool to stop rampant dinosaurs

name: Be Yourself
description: be yourself is a compilation of 5 little games, inspired by Deimos' Endless Pursuit of Becoming Deimos: Part One, from deimos, and Kylie Minogue: Breathe (1998).mp3, from GURN GROUP.

name: Tsuneko Apple
description:
Tsuneko, a tortoiseshell cat, will grow up collecting apples.
When you see the game clear text somewhere, the game is clear!

name: Museum.exe
description:
Museum.exe is a virtual museum about games that have contributed to the field of game design without relying on combat, competition and violence. Games that changed the field of video games, and will be forever looked upon by generations of both players and designers alike.

This interactive museum brings its own challenges, puzzles and secrets for you to explore, in a first-person puzzler format. In it's five exhibitions, you'll get to learn about 25 games that you should probably know about, in a way you probably have not experienced before.

You can not die or win this game and at no point will you be forced to exit the museum. For your optimal experience, treat it as you would a typical museum visit.

name: Raide
description: Sin descripción

name: To Clean The Mountain
description:
To Clean The Mountain is a platforming adventure where you throw yourself towards the summit. The spirit of the mountain will talk with you as you traverse a variety of environments.

Environments
Handcrafted levels based on a variety of mountainous landscapes. Each environment features unique mechanics for you to interact with and learn, combining the interesting platforming elements with puzzle solving.

The Mountain
Elements of the world change based on how you assist the mountain. The game is completable regardless of your choices, but the difficulty is up to you.

name: Honey Farm Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Aradia's Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: Motocross Ramp Madness
description: Sin descripción

name: Path Builder
description:
Don't let your people fall down in the dark - build the path, so they can follow you to a better world.

Connect the path blocks and fill in the empty shapes to create a solid road for your friends. Try to do it in the best way possible to collect the stars. New levels will give you the new challenges. Solve all the puzzles to save all your followers!

name: Jex
description: Sin descripción

name: Goblin in the Castle
description: Sin descripción

name: Minecraft: Bundles of Bravery
description: Minecraft: Bundles of Bravery adds bundles, as well as Hardcore mode for Java Edition Realms. It was announced at Minecraft Live 2024.

name: Minecraft: Bundles of Bravery
description: Minecraft: Bundles of Bravery adds bundles, as well as Hardcore mode for Bedrock Edition. It was announced at Minecraft Live 2024.

name: Mortar Master
description: Sin descripción

name: Math Genius: Addition Edition
description: Math Genius: Addition Edition is a fun and educational game that challenges players with randomly generated addition problems. Players fill in the missing number in the equation by choosing one of three possible answers. Keep track of your progress with on-screen counters displaying your correct and incorrect answers. Perfect for sharpening math skills in a quick, engaging format!

name: Ruins of Dawnseeker
description: Awaken to a world shrouded in mystery in this captivating JRPG dungeon crawler. Follow the intertwined fates of Feriza, Layla, and Yosephine as they navigate treacherous dungeons and face formidable foes, all while piecing together the fragments of their lost memories.

name: Battle Mountain
description: Battle Mountain, the pinnacle of Combat Climbing. Athletes from all over the globe gather to claim the ultimate prize: The Crowntain to grant their deepest wish. Fight across challenging maps with your friends in competitive 2-6 player chaos.

name: Free Durov
description: FREE DUROV – experience all the hardships of prison life and try to escape using your intellect and agility. Can you overcome all the traps and keep the encryption key safe?

name: Clone Your Way Out
description: Embark on a retro sci-fi journey in "Clone Your Way Out," a puzzle side-scroller with nostalgic pixel art. You'll control clones escaping from a mysterious lab, using a Clone Gun to solve deadly puzzles and traps. Enjoy retro visuals and unique cloning mechanics as you guide your clones to freedom.

name: Seifuku Kanojo: Mayoigo Engage
description: Sin descripción

name: Nortopia
description: Help the penguins who fled from the plague and undead build a new life on the island of Nortopia! Construct a fortress, trade with other families, explore dungeons, embark on sea voyages for treasures, and engage in clan battles for power!

name: Number Line
description: Sin descripción

name: Snake 1
description:
SNAKE 1 is a fast-paced one-button game.

Play Snake with just one button. Collect coins to score points and to make the snake grow in size. Press a button to rotate 90 degrees. You rotate clockwise initially, but you reverse your direction every time you collect a coin.

The game is over when you hit any of the borders of the screen or the snake hits its tail.

name: Hyper Biker
description: You compete in a series of events with your BMX bike.

name: The Fireblue Conundrum
description: The Fireblue Conundrum is a miniwad for Doom 2 of varied difficulty and gameplay. It's Boom compatible and every map is meant to be played from a pistol start.

name: Grotto of the Scorned
description: Big non linear level for Doom II, expect the difficulty to be on par with something like Plutonia.

name: 40 Minute-r
description: This is a 14 map vanilla compatible wad where each map is made in about 40 minutes.

name: Last Zombie
description: LAST ZOMBIE is a Single Player Action Adventure Game taking place in the Half-Life 2 Universe.

name: Shortcut Run
description:
Race against opponents, and stack up all the floorboards you can pick up along the way!
If you're clever enough, get out of the way and build bridges and take shortcuts to get to the finish line before everyone else!

name: Fear the Timeloop
description: Fear The Timeloop is a survival horror game where every fifteen minutes, the protagonist dies and resets to the starting point. Can you break the cycle and escape the loop?

name: Smash Your PC
description:
Imagine sitting at your computer when a big error message suddenly pops up! It talks about problems and losing all your work. That's exactly what happens in the Smash Your Computer game! Have you ever felt annoyed when technology doesn't work? Well, this game takes you right into that world!

Your mission is simple: you get to destroy a computer that keeps making mistakes. It's a chance to get back at the computer for all the times it's been troublesome. It's also a safe and fun way to let out your computer-related stress without any real-world consequences.

name: Grand Rush VR: Highway Car Traffic Racing Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Herc's Adventures
description: Sin descripción

name: Final Fantasy XIV: Crossroads
description: Patch 7.1 introduces: new main scenario quests; the first installment from the alliance raid Echoes of Vana'diel, Jeuno: The First Walk; the Extreme version of the Sphene's Burden trial; a new dungeon, Yuweyawata Field Station; a new Ultimate Raid, Futures Rewritten; a new type of high-end content, Chaotic Alliance Raids; and more sidequests and sidecontent.

name: Casting Away
description:
You are a successful movie star, on a private jet flying to a vacation destination. Suddenly, the jet was struck by lightning.
You crash-landed onto an uninhabited island that isn't even on the map.
You wake up on a beach alone.
You find a bizarre altar, strange gems from dead fish, and feel a strange aura spread across the whole island…
Is this really an ordinary deserted island?
Start fishing to survive on a lonely, desolate island.

name: Nerd: Tracing Dayline
description: An adventure game created with the concept of "a game for a single song."

name: Bokura: Planet
description: "Back to the same planet, together... That's all I wanted..." BOKURA: planet is a two-player puzzle adventure that explores new possibilities in cooperative gaming. Players take on the role of the crew on a space exploration ship as they try to escape from a planet where they have crash-landed on.

name: Space Explore VR
description: Sin descripción

developers.name: Yash Future Tech Solutions Pvt Ltd

name: Izon
description: Chibito, who possesses the power of creation, and Kyojin, a weapon of destruction, overcome obstacles and gradually understand and depend on each other. In a decadent and beautiful world, they navigate an adventure driven by the conflicting forces of destruction and creation.

name: PixelQuest: Herb's Adventure
description: A classic, story-driven JRPG with a modern dice-building combat system.

name: Regeneration
description: Regeneration is a third-person survival horror game where you explore an abandoned post-Soviet complex as a scientist. Isolated from the outside world, you face anomalous creatures born from past experiments. Survive, uncover dark secrets, and stop the nightmare before it consumes everything.

name: Shadow Leap
description: In the world of the night, the protagonist who has the power to manipulate "shadows" performs exhilarating actions to "leap" around and, together with his shadow clone, defeats his enemies. Shadow Clone Action game.

name: Bioweaver
description: Bioweaver is an RPG game with the main content of treasure hunting and character building. You can use basic programming logic to deeply customize your skill sets, and you can also create organs with different attributes and functions with the special crafting system.

name: Witch Halloween Dollhouse
description:
Continuation Chelsea adventures: Dollhouse
This little addition sheds light on a possible future that Chelsey may have in the Doll House, and offers several scenes regarding the consequences of the exorcism. Having held on to the jester's box, Chelsey never thought she would end up on the other side of reality. In the house of broken toys, she will need to make a choice: should she stay and become a doll, or should she try to get out?

name: Steel Legion
description: Steel Legion is a NES homebrew metroidvania 2D platformer set in a cyberpunk universe where you play as a cyborg commando. Explore an interconnected world, find secrets and abilities, meet NPCs and battle bosses in order to destroy a dangerous A.I.

name: Poppy Playtime: Chapter 4 - Safe Haven
description:
Brace yourself for the darkest chapter yet in the epic Poppy Playtime saga.

You are pushed deeper into the undiscovered depths of the Playtime Co. factory, far below anything the world knew. Here, you’ll encounter terrifying new threats and discover shocking revelations. Can you outwit the unnatural new creations lurking in the shadows? Can you survive here long enough to eventually unravel the mysteries behind the experiments? Every step will test your courage, every puzzle will challenge your mind, and every corner may be your last.

Will you escape the horrors hidden within Playtime Co., or will you succumb to the terror? Survival isn’t guaranteed. Fear is.

name: Tootum
description: Awaken as Tootum, an entity trapped in an ancient temple. Embark on a journey of precise platforming and deep exploration, unlocking secrets and abilities as you discover your true identity. Each leap and each discovery brings us closer to the truth.

name: Time Riggers
description: Challenge your spatio-temporal logic and memory in this time-hop puzzle game.

name: Petrified Pawns
description: Petrified Pawns has chess-style movement and turn-based combat. Fight new types of chess pieces and bosses. Build your army and keep them alive while you advance through the dungeon. Use healing spells, loot and strategy to keep your king alive and to reach the end with as many units as possible.

name: Serke
description: Serke is a hack and slash game where you fight against a virus invasion. Use 5 different weapons to defeat your enemies and save the virtual world.

name: Retro Drive: Revamped
description: Get your '80s vibes in full throttle with Retro Drive! Immerse yourself in the retro aesthetic, gripping narrative, and an unforgettable synthwave soundtrack.

name: BlightFog
description: Journey across a dying world. Manage your resources. Build relationships with anthropomorphic characters. Find a new home or become a fuel drinking madman.

name: Signed Mary
description: A psychological horror visual novel, in which not your choices of action will determine the story’s end, but the choices of how to perceive your reality.

name: Kill The Dream
description: Kill The Dream is a survival horror game that combines brutal grid-based combat with first person exploration. Search the town of Frozen Pines, where survivors and monsters alike have been warped by the twisted presence in the lake. Hack your way through, end the nightmare, kill the dream.

name: Exovoid Carnage
description: Exovoid Carnage is an intense wave-based arena shooter that cranks up the chaos to eleven. Shoot! Shred! Survive!

name: Thaw
description: Mine for ore, trace your memories, and mine again. When you reach the Snow Crystal at the lowest level, the long winter will come to the end. This gentle and quiet mining visual novel offers a small sense of accomplishment, perfect for sleepless nights.

name: Calm Skies
description: Experience the thrill and tranquility of flying in Calm Skies. Perfect your wingsuit skills as you explore diverse biomes, dodge obstacles, and perform daring tricks to complete skill-testing challenges. Customize your character and enjoy a unique blend of excitement and serenity in the skies.

name: New Fief
description: A relaxed and peaceful territorial management game, without the interference of hostile/competitive forces, allowing you to farm with peace of mind.

name: Mint's Hints
description: Mint's Hints is a cancelled children's show, and you've found yourself on the old set. Find paw-shaped Hints with special ghost-detecting Flashbrights, and discover the secret behind the show's closure with your Happy-Go-Lucky Notebook, but be careful, the stars of the show are after you.

name: Banshee: Demon Girl
description: BANSHEE is a single-player third-person soulsborne stealth action game. The first Japanese kunoichi in 16th century Europe: an incredible story of revenge from beyond the grave. Fight with a katana, move like a ninja, seduce like a geisha, and use vampiric abilities, learn from mistakes.

name: Voice of Belldona
description: Voice of Belldona weaves a story of swords, magic, and sci-fi! The game features roguelike decks, turn-based combat, JRPG elements, and customizable builds. Choose a character and combat style, explore randomly generated maps, power up your team, crush your enemies and... interact with a cute loli?

name: Quibble Race
description:
Compete with the computer or your friends to earn the most money in a futuristic alien-horse racing game. Sponsor some of the quibbles or sabotage them to improve your odds.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Dragon Takers
description: "Rise, those who resist the dragons—"

name: Noroi Kago: The Grudged Domain
description: Noroi Kago: The Grudged Domain is a four-player co-op survival horror game centered on the supernatural "Yokai" from Japanese folklore. Trapped in a cursed domain, you and your companions must work together to endure the curse, hide from the terrifying Yokai, and find a way to escape.

name: Night Manor
description:
Trapped in a nightmare where you must use your wits to survive and escape!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Deep Crafter
description: As a specially trained explorer in "Deep Crafter", you'll gather resources, design production lines, automate everything, and explore this vast, ocean-covered planet to uncover its secrets.

name: Grimstone
description:
Praise Biggan, the four of you survived the saloon fire. But somethin' tells me this story's just gettin' started... Almost two years in the making, this massive game was actually started before its thematic cousin Rail Heist.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Super Alloy Crush
description: "Super Alloy Crush" is a 2D side-scrolling fighting action game. Play as Kelly and Muu (No.02) to defeat enemies and obtain treasure! Join hands with friends and take on challenges together!

name: Mooncat
description:
Jump and dash through forests, caves and mountains, in search of the egg. Conceived as a spiritual sequel to Barbuta,
Game available on UFO 50.

name: Attactics
description:
Carefully arrange your troops for maximum advantage in this game of realtime tactics.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Mortol
description:
How many people will lay down their lives to save Mortolia? The first game in the Mortol series.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Twin Flames
description: Embark on a mystical journey as Savitri and Satyavan, two characters destined to become Twin Flames. In this enthralling turn-based puzzle adventure, you'll guide them through a beautifully stylized low poly world, navigating a hex grid filled with obstacles and challenges.

name: Velgress
description:
The space pirate Alpha is trapped in the deep pit known as Velgress. Help her climb out!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Avianos
description:
In a time when birds rule, an epic war rages between the red talons and the blue beaks.
Game available on UFO 50.

name: Mirage: Ignis Fatuus
description: As the world turns short of Mana, Mirage, the city of illusions, is in danger of collapsing! Help Kyuboy’d make his way through mind-boggling puzzles to save his hometown!

name: Dragon Front: Adventures
description: A turn-based, deckbuilding roguelike where you take charge of a legendary Champion and build your forces by collecting units, spells, supplies and relics. Explore unique combinations to overwhelm the opposition.

name: An Unexpectedly Green Journey
description: From birth to death, craft your orc's legacy. Wield the powers of a shaman or chief. Conquer the world. Become a god or a demon lord. Do what orcs do best!

name: Magic Archery
description: Train a commoner to become the greatest archer in this short incremental game! Increase your stats, buy upgrades, infuse your arrows with magic, and gather clout from quests.

name: Out of Your Mind
description: A hand-drawn, comic-style visual novel where your choices shape the storyline. Guide Lia through various decisions and emotions that lead to different outcomes.

name: A Hell of a Bloody Dragon
description:
In this Open World Horror Adventure FPS, You have been miraculously resurrected from the dead with a noble mission: to capture a magnificent dragon for the Red Lord, who believes that this act will bring happiness to his kingdom.

Embark on a perilous journey and gather essential tools along the way to aid you in successfully capturing the dragon and ultimately bring joy to the heart of the Red Lord.

You will rediscover yourself and go through some horrific challenges before going home.

name: All Whispering Tome
description: A reading adventure game about exploring stories. The hidden stories in the game are unfold while you read multiple seamingly unrelated stories.

name: Lost Diskettes Vol. 1
description: This is a collection of short and experimental horror experiences, focused on surreal and bizarre plots.

name: Tiny Pixel Planets
description: Explore the pixel cosmos, jumping from star system to star system. Land on fully procedural planets, and make them your home.

name: Dungeon Antiqua
description: Dungeon Antiqua is a simple RPG inspired by the Wizardry and Final Fantasy games of the 1980s and 1990s, in which players traverse dungeons by repeatedly exploring and developing their characters.

name: Mechanines Tower Defense
description: Position your EvoDogs against the threats of a machine-dominated future and enjoy this TOWER DEFENSE game with ROGUE-LITE elements!

name: Crown & Capital
description: As the new ruler of a kingdom recovering from fiscal ruin, your job is to keep the torches lit and replenish the treasury. Learn to manage your finances by budgeting for your needs, wants, and savings to make your people thrive and your neighbors respect the legacy of the kingdom you will build!

name: Vollemental
description: Sin descripción

name: Propeller Rat
description: Pilot a propeller-strapped rat through increasingly challenging, hazard-filled worlds with

name: Rem Psycho
description: Sin descripción

name: Midnight T-Rex
description: Play as a dinosaur. Explore a mysterious dungeon, defeat foes, and challenge bosses in this roguelite game.

name: Slumbering Feline
description: Sin descripción

name: Gurk in Trouble: A Yip Quest Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Cisini Stories
description: Cisini Stories is an engaging Android otome game designed to immerse you in a world of romance and adventure.

name: Rabbiman Adventures
description: Rabbiman Adventures is a charming 3D platformer about a small and brave hero named Yasha. Uncover the mysteries of the secret room and help your friends to save the magic forest. Interesting puzzles and many exciting acrobatic challenges await you!

name: Return Journey
description: Sin descripción

name: River of Rage
description:
Two park rangers have been asked to monitor the end of the infamous grade five Tully river rapids, and to help anyone in trouble.

With a storm approaching and a dangerous criminal on the loose, surely no one would be crazy enough to risk coming through this part of the river. But some rafters love to push the limits...

name: You Must Mop
description: You live alone. Someone is coming over. You must mop. Play as a raccoon who has to mop up the floor in anticipation of big changes.

name: Akai Heya
description: Akai Heya is an early Japanese internet Flash game, which is believed to be the origin of the Red Room Curse myth in Japan. The game tells the story of a young boy who unfortunately is cursed and dies after seeing the pop-up.

name: Damien Crawford's Golf Experience 2024
description: A minimalist golf game that will test your patience.

name: Tidekeeper
description: Ride the waves in Tidekeeper, a strategy adventure game where you guide Finn and Chumby to help the residents of the Hourglass Isles. Master the art of scheduling to maximize your impact as you assist islanders, complete time-sensitive tasks, and dive into a variety of fun and engaging minigames.

name: Little Hooky
description: Little Hooky is a tiny fishing game for a little slack off. if there's nothing to stop you now then, Why don't you play a Little Hooky from work.

name: Rogue Station Defense
description: A replayable rogue-like sci-fi Tower Defense strategy game.

name: Subterranauts
description: Subterranauts is a 2-6 player multiplayer horror game with proximity voice chat and terrifying creatures. Your job is to complete assignments by gathering scrap for the Association of Scrap Allocation. Work together with your team to complete assignments, earn company Bucks, and survive!

name: Entwine
description: A first person psychological horror game. Experience a hand-crafted singleplayer campaign, or partner up with up to 4 players in a cooperative horror adventure.

name: Submarine Survivor
description: Dive into the ocean's depths, face fearsome sea creatures, and collect their experience crystals. Upgrade your submarines with various combinations of weapons and chips.

name: Stratagem Lost
description: Brave perilous turn-based strategy encounters and uncover dark conspiracies in a broken world. Draft your team of unique characters and have them learn skills from each other.

name: Azura's Crystals
description: Embark on an enchanting quest as Azura, a spirited heroine, and discover a world of ancient mysticism. Forge unbreakable bonds with mythical creatures using the power of Primalis Crystals. Traverse breathtaking landscapes, make difficult choices, and uncover the secrets that shape your destiny.

name: Roxy Raccoon's Pinball Panic: Manic Miners
description: Two new mining themed tables: "Deadly Digs" and "Malicious Mines".

name: Place of Decay
description: Explore a corrupted game project in this horror-puzzle adventure. Uncover the mystery behind its collapse and the developer's abandonment. Use the Code Cannon to break through the digital barriers and navigate the chaotic realm to uncover the truth behind its downfall.

name: No Happy Days
description: A short RPG with only one fight. Uncover the truth of the past of the frogs.

name: Geezer Gus: The Meteorite Motel
description: The Meteorite Motel is a surreal JRPG based upon the Geezer Gus franchise. Upon receiving news of an unidentified meteorite landing near the area, Gus makes his way to the crash site known as the Meteorite Motel. Among the loathsome and vile occupants of the motel lies a suspicious colony, who are interested in harnessing the meteorite's power. The player must navigate through the unpredictable and dangerous motel with the help of formidable allies in order the reach the meteorite first.

name: Quantum Sleeper
description: Research Facility G-1-6 has gone dark. Your mission: reestablish contact and investigate the communication blackout. Equipped with AEGIS-scanner and a flashlight, uncover what is really going on here.

name: Hark the Ghoul
description: Slash, kick and magick your way through an adventure brimming with secrets and curious encounters! HARK THE GHOUL offers a meticulously handcrafted world to explore, inspired by the interconnected nature of the first DARK SOULS.

name: Digbeat: Godot Deeper
description: A rhythm digging arcade game. Move to the beat and try to reach new depths!

name: Mariana
description: You are dropped into an unknown trench to explore. You will find fantastical creatures and rare artifacts. Fight bosses and mini-bosses in order to dive as deep as possible and uncover the mystery of the trench.

name: Portrait of a Torn
description: As a young soldier returning to an eerily deserted home, you'll explore enigmatic rooms, solve intricate puzzles, and uncover a haunting, tragic story.

name: Love is in the Airship
description: In this wacky yuri dating sim, come aboard a magical airship cruise and experience romance, hijinks, and a crazy story with over 15 endings! Lots of choices and lots of really cute girls to date.

name: Stacy Sharp and the Night Of Too Many Monsters
description: Survive waves of enemies, buy permanent upgrades, befriend colorful characters, die and do it all over again.

name: Conduct AR!
description: Conduct AR! is an epic augmented reality game of explosive railway action. Set in the old west you journey through diorama worlds that unfold right in front of you. Commanding trains, switching tracks and avoiding collisions, playing out in reality on the table in front of you. Look over and around landscapes, solve spatial puzzles and keep the situation under control to become the ultimate conductor in the Wild West.

name: Fire Rescue
description:
A game from 2009 that was distributed with Nestles Cereals. In the game the player controls a plane based on an Canadair CL-415 and CL-215.

Extinguish wildfires before the entire forest is engulfed in flames. Learn how to fly your firefighting aircraft. Fly low and skim nearby lakes to pick up water, then release it over the fires. Put out all the fires before time runs out to complete the level and save the forest.

name: Stream Train
description: Twitch integrated game where viewers use chat commands to guess if cards will be higher or lower to avoid obstacles. Ideal for Starting Soon or Break scenes.

name: Sea Rescue
description:
A game from 2009 that was distributed with Nestles Cereals. In the game the player controls a helicopter based on an Eurocopter MH-65 Dolphin.

Rescue people from the water and transport them to the safety boat. Learn how to fly your helicopter. Use the radar to help you and rescue everyone before time runs out. Your helicopter has limited capacity, so you will need to make multiple trips.

name: Air Drop
description:
A game from 2009 that was distributed with Nestles Cereals. In the game the player controls a helicopter based on an Lockheed C-130 Hercules.

Distribute medical aid to remote areas in need. Learn how to fly your plane and drop packages on the targets. You get points for accuracy so wait for the right moment to release the cargo.

name: Blue Light
description: Blue Light is a horror adventure game set in the year 2029. The main character goes in search of his missing sister, exploring the most dangerous and paranormal places in the city.

name: Helen in Hell
description: Helen in Hell is a bullet hell game where you fight & dash-dodge your way through dungeon waves of themed enemies. Unlock new weapons, abilities & power levels to help you defeat four challenging & unique bosses at the end of each dungeon.

name: Millumi
description: You've never thought about playing as a sheep solving mirror puzzles—until now. Millumi is a minimalist puzzle game where you are guided by a crow, directing light beams through mirrors to solve various puzzles. You'll face obstacles, mechanisms, and progressively challenging levels.

name: Blood: What Lies Beneath
description: Follow Caleb who is lost at sea to a mysterious island. What will he discover beneath the surface, in the bowels of the island? A dark cult has taken over a mansion, its surroundings and the secrets beneath the reef. This is a non-linear addon for Blood. Fight the way you want, choose your own path through the island and find places otherwise kept a secret. Find clues to progress with tomes around the island

name: Drive Thru Miami
description: A simulation of running and expanding a drive-thru shop where players take orders, prepare various beverages and foods, manage supplies, and serve customers efficiently.

name: Arctic Flyer
description:
A game from 2009 that was distributed with Nestles Cereals. In the game the player controls a plane based on an Cessna 185 Skywagon.

Embark on an arctic mission and photograph wildlife. Maneuver the plane through the Arctic wilderness and take good photos to document the wildlife for scientists. Every photo counts, so use film wisely.

name: Five Nights at Mr. Krabs
description:
Five Nights at the Krusty Krab is the official prequel to Five Nights at the Chum Bucket, and was released on January 29th, 2015. It is the first game in the series.

Mr Krabs has opened a brand new Krusty Krab in the city, staffed completely by animatronic versions of his old employees (because it was cheaper than paying their salarys). You are hired as the night watchman at this new restraunt, however strange things begin to happen as the lights go out, and you find yourself in a greater danger than you had expected...

name: Night Doner
description: You have just started the night shift in a doner shop. At first everything seems ordinary and quiet, but you soon realize that this is no ordinary night.

name: Woody Woodpecker: Escape from Buzz Buzzard Park
description: Woody Woodpecker: Escape from Buzz Buzzard Park is an adventure game. The progress in the game is based primarily on the skill and dexterity needed to overcome obstacles that present themselves (to cross chasms, climb walls) or unblock access to the following level by manipulating objects (Woody sometimes needs use his beak to that effect). The game features a battle against Buzz Buzzard's minions, where Woody can use his beak or special attacks to fight.

name: Football Manager 25
description: Welcome to a new era of football management. Create iconic moments in your own football universe where only you define your destiny.

name: Football Manager 25 Console
description: Football Manager 25 Console is back for the new season, launching on Xbox, Xbox Game Pass and PS5 from Nov 26.

name: Football Manager 25 Touch
description: Football Manager 25 Touch is returning to Nintendo Switch for another campaign!

name: Football Manager 25 Mobile
description: After a record-breaking debut campaign, FM25 Mobile is returning exclusively to Netflix.

name: Skat
description: Skat is a mobile card game developed by Isar Interactive, offering a digital version of the classic German card game Skat. Designed for both beginners and experienced players, the game provides a variety of play modes, including single-player against AI opponents and multiplayer with friends or other players online. With customizable settings, detailed statistics, and an intuitive interface, Skat delivers an authentic experience of this traditional game in a convenient mobile format.

name: Riding the Wave
description:
This short little game is intended to be a calm, meditative experience.

It takes around 10-20 minutes to complete, depending on how quickly the riddles are solved.

Some corners have to be thought around, but in the end it's quite simple.

name: Sleepwalking
description: Sleepwalking is a snowy adventure across 3 MBF21 maps that exists because Ravendesk made a few midis and wanted to make maps to accompany them. UV is designed to be somewhat challenging, but fair (think mid Valiant to mid Sunlust difficulty-wise). HMP should be very accessible to most players, while HNTR is a walk in the park for those who just want to enjoy a snowy landscape. Whichever difficulty you choose, expect to receive a buffed weapon roster that should help you to deal with the opposing monster forces.

name: Sea of Stars: Dawn of Equinox
description: Free update adding local cooperative play, combat 2.0, revamped prologue, bonus cinematic scene, speedrunner mode, difficulty presets, improved parrot relic, Quebecois localization and quality of life improvements.

name: Babelomania
description: A technogothic horror where a beautiful wedding turns into a death trap... Who will survive?

name: My Monster
description: An adults-only visual novel about Samuel Hart, an anxious man finally making the big leap: moving in with his soon-to-be-not-so-long-distance-anymore boyfriend—the big and friendly Sullivan, a monster who wears his heart on his sleeve. With Samuel settling in, and Sullivan off work for a few days, the two make the most out of their first few days of cohabitation. Follow the couple as they hit up the town, go shopping, visit the city, relax under the stars, and more!

name: Curiosity
description:
"Curiosity killed the cat, But satisfaction brought it back."

Play as a cat as you leap and climb through a perilous labyrinth of obstacles, all to find your way back home.

name: 100 Hiddensaurs: Greece
description:
Dinosaurs escaped to Ancient Greece. Try to find them all. And get a mini-game.
By purchasing DLC, you will get a new level in the game 100 Hiddensaurs.

DLC INCLUDE:
New level
New mini game

name: Animal Company
description: In Animal Company venture with friends deep into dark forests and spooky caves to collect loot and bring it back to your base.

name: The Secret of Maike Island
description: Sin descripción

name: Ancestral
description: Play as Miguel, a member of a Masonic fraternity, as you investigate the disappearance of your brothers in a mysterious residence. Uncover the secrets brought from Egypt, deal with supernatural forces and interdimensional horrors. Discover what really happened and face the unknown.

name: Three Skies Ascension
description: A turn based, story driven, strategic RPG with challenging dungeons and hundreds of heroes and creatures to collect and customize.

name: Baseball Superstars 2024
description:
Baseball Superstars 2024 is a fantasy baseball game inspired by the Gamevil sports game franchise!
Develop unique players and relive the nostalgia of the original Baseball Superstars series with Baseball Superstars 2024!
Show off your incredible pitches and batting skills with the Elite Players you produce!
Train your fantastic players with the key trainers of the series!
Participate in exciting events and claim treasure trove of rewards! Jump in now and join the fun!

name: Beastly Tactics
description: A turn-based role-playing game where you embody a clever animal, facing off against others in strategic battles resolved through intuition and deception. Outsmart your opponents using the timeless tactics of Rock, Paper, Scissors.

name: The Tensor
description: Sin descripción

name: Night Fright
description: Discover a haunting tale of a father, who driven by madness, tragically killed his daughter. Set in a bleak, atmospheric house, you experience the father's deteriorating mind. As the father goes deeper into his own nightmare, he must confront the devastating consequences of his actions.

name: Yuri Paddle: An Anime Convention Murder Mystery
description: Onkai Expo is on fire. As the guest coordinator of a smalltime anime convention with big problems, it's up to the underpaid and overburdened Stella to solve the murder of a famous cosplayer.

name: Mafia Reigns: Power And Blood
description:
Dominate the underworld in this immersive strategic card game as a mafia boss!
Dive into the thrilling world of organized crime in a role-playing card-style game, where you ascend to the pinnacle of the criminal underworld, experiencing fate as a mafia boss or other key characters. Discover unique criminal sagas across different eras in America and beyond.

name: Witch You Want
description:
With an oddly sparkly magical paper, you look over the job listing for a local witch needing an assistant with making potions before the town festival that weekend. Something so short notice would surely be hard for her to find workers, and you just happen to be inbetween jobs—so you sign up, unsure exactly what to expect......

A pompous and questionably excellent witch runs a local apothecary in town but finds that if she wants to make enough potions before the festival that weekend to sell (and keep her ongoing potion shop afloat) she'll need some assistance. After a dubious help wanted ad, she gains you as an assistant. Will the two of you see through to the festival? Will you be able to make a single potion? Will this girlfailure capture your heart?!

name: Hot Foot
description:
It's time to grab your beanbags and settle your differences on the hot foot court!
Based on an actual children's game played by Smolksi and Chun in elementary school.

name: Planet Zoldath
description:
Brave the wilds of Planet Zoldath in search of the intergalactic treasure map!
Though they remain unnamed, Pilot and the Campanella make their first appearance in this game.

name: Rail Heist
description:
The most infamous train robbers in the west pull off a series of daring heists.
Takes place in the world of Lonestar, a setting also used by the game Grimstone.

name: Rakshasa
description: Even death won't stop Jangi from avenging the destruction of his village by demons!

name: Arena Breakout: Season 1
description: The beginning of Arena Breakout.

name: The Oily Depths
description: Pilot an oil-drilling submarine for a mysterious corporation. You better meet your quota or they will cut your oxygen. Be careful, your machinery may attract the attention of something lurking below.

name: Arena Breakout: Season 3 - Enter the Vault
description: Sin descripción

name: Porgy
description: Strange happenings near the coast! Dive deep and get to the bottom of what's fishy in the sea.

name: Arena Breakout: Season 4 - Into the Fog of War
description: Sin descripción

name: The Most Terrible Time of the Year
description: A short Christmas horror game where your ultimate goal is to gather 50 scattered Christmas gifts within a mysterious mansion to break free from a twisted holiday nightmare.

name: Arena Breakout: Season 5 - Road to Gold
description: Sin descripción

name: Hitler is My Crush: Love and Fascism
description: Hitler is My Crush: Love and Fascism is a crazy love story that defies logic, common sense and everything you knew about the world. You play as a girl madly in love with... Hitler.

name: Bussy Master: Halloween Advent 2024
description: Surrender to the allure of Bussy Master: Halloween 2024! Encounter seductive zombies, irresistible demons, sultry vampires, haunting werewolves, sinister evil clowns, mysterious masked killers and lots more! Let your deepest fantasies awaken in this thrilling puzzle adventure. 🧩

name: My Direct Damag 7 Trillion
description: A strategic pixel-style dungeon-crawling game where you can purchase hundreds of different weapons and armors in the shop, mix and match freely to create the best battle strategy for you, enhance your output capability, defeat bosses, and strive towards the astonishing goal of 70 trillion output.

name: Time's Prison
description: A pirate who is burning with love for treasure finally finds the treasure island on the map. However, the pirate has puzzles to solve and adventures to go through. The story of the game starts right here.

name: Gravity Up
description: Gravity UP

name: Boxcars
description: Free and open source online backgammon.

name: Pluto Lost Its Colors
description: Join Pluto in its quest to reclaim its colors in this chaotic yet rewarding experience! Pluto Lost Its Colors is a fast paced platformer with physics based controls. Take control and master the unpredictable physics of Pluto as you roll, jump, and dash through challenges.

name: Towerø
description: Sin descripción

name: The Witch's Fairy Tale
description: "The Witch's Fairy Tale" is an action rogue, role-playing game developed by "a little Han Han Duck OVO", you will play a witch, to find magic around the world, your adventure along the way will be written as a fairy tale to pass on.

name: Mouth Trap
description: Mouth Trap is a retro-style arcade game where your aim is to eat as much food as you can. But watch out for those pesky germs that get in your way! Lots of treats can help (or hinder) you in your mission to complete over 100 levels of fun. Can you become a "Champion Chomper"?

name: Hot And Lovely Waifu XXII
description: This game is a classic elimination game, full of fun and challenges！ Quickly swap the positions of various cute icons on the board, and the same ones will be eliminated. Each level has different requirements, so let them eliminate more~

name: Hot And Lovely XXII
description: This is a classic elimination game. A chessboard full of various playful and cute elements will be presented in the game interface. You need to connect at least three identical elements in a straight line to eliminate them by moving the icons on the chessboard.

name: Kai-Ri-Sei Million Arthur: Ring
description: Million Arthur Ring is the latest sequel in the Million King Arthur series, bringing back the familiar four-Arthurs gameplay and four-player co-op mode. The game retains the classic card battle mechanics, including attribute weaknesses and card chain buffs, while introducing new strategic elements through CCG-style turn-based gameplay. Players can collect and customize various cards to build their ideal team.

name: Riddle Tower: Halloween DLC
description: Monkid is here to celebrate Halloween with a DLC featuring 25 new spooky-themed levels. Follow his journey to the spooky castle and test your brain in these fresh adventures.

name: Nuclear Lizard Island Rampage
description: Play as an enraged kaiju and defend your home against industrialists stripping it of its resources.

name: President 47
description: The republic is under attack, but the enemies of freedom are on the run. We've got them right where we want them, folks, as their schemes unravel and their plots are exposed for the whole world to see. We need you to help the 47th president to restore order. Stay vigilant, complete the journey.

name: Invasion of The Halloween Fiends
description: Invasion of The Halloween Fiends is a First-Person Retro horror game that takes place on Halloween Night. Strangers keep visiting you looking for candy. Some of them may not be so friendly. Will you be able to survive Halloween Night?

name: Combat Master: Season 1
description: Sin descripción

name: Steel Division 2: Reinforcement Pack #14 - Aces
description: Welcome 10 new Aces to Steel Division 2 with the free Reinforcement Pack #14. A mix of original Steel Division: Normandy ‘44 and new legendary soldiers, commanders, and airmen join the fight. Paired with their trademark unit, Aces feature unique camouflage, paint jobs, markings, and portraits.

name: Who Wants to Be A Millionaire: Microsoft Games DLC Pack
description: Challenge yourself and your friends with this brand-new theme: Microsoft Games

name: Trainz Railroad Simulator 2022: SSR Fletchers Crawfords GE C44aci Pack
description: Drive the Australian C44Aci diesel locomotives, in the Crawfords (PHC class), Fletchers/SSR (FIE class), and Southern Shorthaul Railroad (CEY class) liveries, each with multiple weathering levels and custom features.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Sundarpatan Cosmetic Pack
description: Decorate your weapons, tents, and ground blinds with cosmetics inspired by Sundarpatan Nepal Hunting Reserve. The contents of this pack are cosmetic only.

name: Combat Master: Season 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - LakePal Bait Boat Pack
description: Take your bait game to the next level with the LakePal Bait Boat! This remote-controlled device lets you deploy bait further from the shore with pin-point precision and control.

name: Warframe: Jade Chorus Pack
description: Pierce through suffocating darkness by adding the radiant songstress Warframe, Jade, along with her signature Customizations to your Arsenal!

name: Last Mind Standing
description: When you need answers, you ask questions. When you don't get them, there is always another way, although it won't be easy. Put the helmet on, lay down, close your eyes, take a deep breath and relax. In a few moments, nightmares will get real.

name: Schizophrenia: The Last Shift
description: Remembering the past while corruption occurs, you are set out to finish the remainder of your shift until you cannot anymore. Stock the shelves using your forklift and be a productive member of society while evading the inner demons within you in this horror survival to meet quota.

name: Fire Emblem: The Morrow’s Golden Country
description:
Ulmaron. A world of constant change. Of mystical researchers. Of fierce warriors. Of fallen kings. Of undying darkness.

A young noble, seeking to prove herself. Her path will place her at the center of a conflict that may very well decide the future of the continent.

name: Capybara Go!
description:
Love capybaras so much you want to play as one? Get ready to embark on a whimsical adventure with a bunch of furry, feathery, fantastic friends!
Introducing the craziest capybara roguelike adventure RPG!
Dive into the world of capybaras with "CAPYBARA GO"!

name: Deadbeat
description: Make your voice heard in this isometric Action-RPG where quick thinking and patience guide the way to victory. In a hazy Hereafter that's not heaven or hell, fight bizarre demons, call your friends, and explore the deepest reaches of death.

name: Maze Domination
description: A fast-paced maze game where strategy and speed are key. Control unique robots through intricate mazes, collecting figurines across diverse biomes. Manage energy, avoid or kill enemies, and compete on leaderboards.

name: An Unfinished Game
description: Welcome to the Unfinished Game Testing facility! As our new tester, you will have to make your way through a series of unexpected experiments in this first-person adventure. Small puzzles, platforming, meta gameplay and a group of silly NPC awaits you in this unpredictable factory.

name: Touhou Renkyouto: Subterranean Festival of Love and Jealousy
description: Touhou Renkyouto is a top-down bullet hell title starring the green-eyed Parsee Mizuhashi. Adventure from from the Underworld to the surface and back again to solve an incident involving stray spirits causing chaos, and maybe help Parsee realize her love along the way.

name: Syobon Action Nostalg
description: Syobon Action Nostalg is a reboot (not a remake) of the rage game named Syobon Action/Cat Mario. This game is done for those players who likes some fair challenge (and specially more for the Syobon fans).

name: Idle Tower Defense
description: Control a single tower to fight off hordes of enemies. No randomization. Choose from a variety of modules to create unique builds and upgrade modules and survive endless waves.

name: Super Mario Unleashed
description: Super Mario Unleashed is a 2D Platforming game featuring normal levels in the daytime & reverse levels in the night, with combat.

name: Super Mario Bros. NP
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario: Battle for the Mushroom Kingdom
description: Sin descripción

name: Bean to Me!
description: Use strange and magical beans to bend the rules and chain together absurd synergies in a wild twist on the ancient game of Mancala. Battle your friends, collect new beans, and build the ultimate bean loadout.

name: Intensive (S)care Unit
description:
Lia, a junior resident, steps into her first night shift in the ICU, expecting exhaustion, not trepidation. Alongside her senior, Satria, this shift begins to unravel in unsettling ways—bells ringing from empty rooms, whispers crawling through the halls, and the dead returning with unfinished business.

As Lia confronts an eerie truth, she begins to question: is this night shift outside the bounds of reality—or has she crossed over herself?

name: Dazed In Space
description:
It's the year 1989 and the best evening of the year, Halloween! Three kids go trick or treating in the neighborhood but things take a very strange turn and they end up in a great adventure.

Dazed In Space is an adventure game but with an old school JRPG presentation where the focus is on story and simple puzzle solving.

name: The Knight of Thistledown
description:
You wake up to discover a man standing in front of you who introduces himself as ‘The Knight of Thistledown.’ Who is this mysterious stranger and why does the name ‘Thistledown’ sound so familiar?

A short visual novel about taking chances and learning more about yourself.

name: Ten Ten
description: Ten Ten is a unique game that combines shooting, puzzles, and bullet-dodging.

name: Cyber Quest
description: Cyber Quest is a cyberpunk deckbuilder. Assemble a ragtag crew of hackers, mercenaries, and street-savvy rogues to take on the most feared crime gangs in the city.

name: Beans Of Production
description: Hone your barista skills to smash daily goals and stave off the thirsty masses in this rogue-lite match-3 deckbuilder. Play your cards right to clear ingredients, beat increasingly demanding quotas, unlock passives, and make it through the work week.

name: Starship Troopers: Continuum
description: It’s 25 years since the Battle of Klendathu, and the war between the Federation and the Arachnid is deadlocked. But the planet Janus-4 holds a secret that threatens to tip the balance of the war - one way or the other.

name: Lords of Diskonia
description: War has come to land of Disks, and the red and blue armies are on a collision course!

name: Block Koala
description: Flamingus has stolen all the water! Solve puzzles to defeat him and save the park!

name: Campanella
description: Fly the Campanella through five challenging worlds! And don't forget to stop for coffee!

name: Golfaria
description: Deep beneath the fairway, a golf ball awakens. Where did it come from? What is its purpose?

name: Oktoberfest
description: Dive into the ultimate VR fun fair game, bringing the excitement and social buzz of the original Munich Oktoberfest right to your home.

name: SpellForce: Conquest of Eo - Weaver's Realms
description: The Weaver’s Realms DLC introduces endless worlds that can be created with a simple click – your game will never be the same again.

name: Waldorf's Journey
description: Waldorf didn't go looking for adventure. He was just trying to enjoy a nice nap...

name: Bob Smith and the Unsolved Case of Mystery
description: Sin descripción

name: Sphere vs. Gravity
description:
Sphere vs Gravity is a physics-based puzzle platformer that challenges your reflexes skills where you navigate through dynamic, gravity-defying environments.

Be prepared—this game is hard and requires time to adapt.

name: Bone Sniffer!
description: Sin descripción

name: Quality Dreams, Reasonably Priced
description: Work as a body modification consultant in a dystopian future. Talk to clients, make recommendations, and decide how much to upsell them. Your choices will impact each of their lives. Balance helping others with earning enough to save your sick rabbit.

name: Boxman in the World of the Wuuza Wizards
description: Sin descripción

name: Brad Bradson in Key Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Krolewna Sniezka
description: Snow White and seven dwarfs welcome to an amazingly funny and exciting game! All children will enjoy truly funny rhymes and puzzles in the Magic Mirror quiz, search for treasures in the mine, creating your own seven dwarfs, a funny colouring game and many more amazing games! You will be able to test your reflexes during Sweet Marmalading, show off your good memory and observation skills as well as artistic skills in composing your own songs! You can also conjure up a special elixir the effects of which will be truly surprising! First of all, the child will be introduced to the wonderful world of fairy tales and will experience unforgettable adventures!

name: Alfabet Nauka czytania i pisania
description: Sin descripción

name: Ksiega Dzungli
description: The Jungle Book is a game that depicts the story of a boy raised by wolves in the Indian jungle. The whole gives the child a chance to get to know various wild animals, including by taking pictures of them, or showing off their dexterity in saving small wolves. In addition, our Ms. people test their strategic abilities during the “Old Expeditions after the Red AFlow,” pass through the Dark Labyrinths and learn the mystery of Kaa’s Serpent.

name: Ide do szkoly
description: Game for children from the age of five. It is a collection of games and educational games in which the youngest learn, numbers, letters, shapes, colors, animals and plants. Playing exercises memory, develops the ability to mate and think logically. The task of the program is to introduce a child in small steps to the world of school education.

name: Kingdoms Of Eternity
description: Kingdoms of Eternity is an action RPG where you explore warring kingdoms, battle hordes of demonic enemies, and discover legendary treasures. Customize your skills and shape the future of the kingdom in an epic adventure filled with intense combat and mystery.

name: Herkules
description: Sin descripción

name: Wyprawa po zlote runo
description: Sin descripción

name: Matematyka Dodawanie i odejmowanie
description: In the fairytale land, animals teach children the basics of mathematics: adding, subceding and comparing numbers. The program includes six educational games designed for several players, many rich animations and cheerful music. Animals explain the principles of mathematics and accompany children in solving tasks. This is an education combined with great fun

name: Koziolek Matolek idzie do szkoly
description:
The basic themes are learning the alphabet, adding and subtracting, learning colors, shapes, directions of the world, the consequences of time, logical thinking and matching, and practicing memory.Prepared games include the level of kindergarten and first-class elementary school.The math of the Matołek guides a small user through the full surprises of Pacanov. The program includes 11 educational games, in three versions differing in difficulty. This allows you to adjust the level of complexity of the games to the capabilities of a small player.

The alphabet, the numbers and figures are taught by caterpillars, adding a child learns during archery competitions, directions of the world looking for treasure in the pacancan dungeons, colors in play with a great machine, perceptiveness in the Patcanian forge, from which objects are lost, while the consequences of time in the film studio of the Goat Matołek. The test of the progress in learning is fun - the path of Goat Matołek to school, where you need to demonstrate knowledge gained in other modules. The program includes many fun animations of the Matołek's Goat and his friends, fragments of films, interesting music and cheerful comments from the teacher.

name: Terroro
description: In this psychological horror experience, you take on the role of a famous TikToker's boyfriend whose seemingly perfect life hides dark secrets. As you explore her home and uncover disturbing clues, you'll realize that nothing is as it seems. This short but intense game is designed to immerse you in a world where reality and fiction intertwine.

name: Junior MithulBlox
description: Sin descripción

name: Untangle Goats
description: Untangle Goats is a 2D puzzle game based on the action of drag and dropping milk baby bottles. It is set on a farm with a lot a hungry baby goats. You will have to find out the right combinations of various playful patterns, composed of letters, numbers and symbols on those labelled baby bottles, in order to feed all of the baby goats on the farm.

name: Mario's Slightly Unusual Boss Rush
description: Mario's slightly Unusual Boss Rush is a SMB3-inspired fangame where Mario goes around defeating bosses in levels based on franchises that are not his own.

name: Märchen Line
description:
Embrace the indomitable human spirit by serving in the First Among Father's Voyager Armada- The Bravest of The Brave, who venture out to liberate the Milky Way from the True Enemy.

Serving as a Soldier means embracing infinite potential. With the blessing of His Runes, you will grow stronger, smarter, faster and braver in a few weeks than you have in your entire life. All that growth comes with responsibility, and you will be expected to pay your civic dues- but luckily each Soldier is assigned a Valkyrie to help them manage their priorities.

Train your stats, build your relationships, and be all you can be...or push past the galactic narrative and seek a deeper understanding of humanity's true ranking in the galactic hierarchy.

name: Dead or Alive Ultimate
description: Dead or Alive Ultimate features the original SEGA Saturn version of Dead or Alive as well as a totally redesigned Dead or Alive 2 along with more costumes and more features including the addition of Live! support so the player can take their fight online.

name: Taxi 3

name: PyRunner
description:
Welcome to PyRunner, an endless-runner game where you join PyGuy in a fun and challenging adventure to retrieve his dropped pies! Help him navigate through a shut-down highway, filled with obstacles and... other stuff...

Collect Pies: PyGuy needs your help to gather as many pies as he can. The more pies you collect, the higher your score and the more options you have to unlock W features.

Slide Under Obstacles: Test your reflexes and agility as you slide under barriers and fences to avoid obstacles that come your way. Quick thinking is the key to success!

Avoid Cars: Beware of cars passing through! Dodge the oncoming vehicles. slide through narrow gaps to keep PyGuy safe on his pie-retrieving mission.

Trade Pies for Unique Power-Ups: Exchange your collected pies for awesome power-ups. Activate a shield for protection, slow-down time, and more!

Customize PyGuy: Show off your style by customizing PyGuy with various outfits. Pick look that fits your style as you run through the highway.

Compete for the Highest Pie Count: Get as much as you can. If you think you have enough, you are mistaken.

Join PyGuy on his thrilling adventure in PyRunner! I mean, it's a guy running for pies. How dare you pass? Download now and help him reclaim his dropped pies. It's time to run, slide, and collect your way to victory! Are you up for the challenge? Let's get started!

description: This is a Megaman X fangame. It involves Axl shooting at Metalls.

name: Eric & Yannik X

name: Crash Car Mania
description: Take part in the death race in this game. Ride fast and crash cars of your rivals. It will be harder with each new level. But you can upgrade your car and open new abilities, it will help you. Roar of the engine and clang of metal will not leave you indifferent.

name: Get Baz Home
description: Bizzare retro platformer featuring warped level design

name: Paper Mario: Showtime!!
description:
Paper Mario: Showtime!! is a fangame aiming to take the battle systems of Sticker Star and Color Splash, two of the more... infamous... games in the series, and fix 'em up!

Showtime is an arcade experience - Mario fights round after round of enemies, building the strength of his deck with each victory. The whole while, the audience is watching, cheering as he does well, and jeering if he does poorly. The more you please the audience, the higher your score will be! The goal is to get the highest score you can in the amount of time you have!

Mario can use the coins he earns to buy new cards, upgrade old ones, get rid of ones he doesn't need anymore, or upgrade his stats between rounds. And every once in a while, there might be a super-tough enemy to deal with...

name: GoombaGotchi
description:
A simple game where you play as a Goomba and collect PowerUps.

You must collect the GOOD PowerUps. The one chosen throughout the Goomba evolution family tree. Avoid the BAD PowerUps. The Poison Mushrooms are to be avoided.
Collect over 15 GOOD PowerUps to continue to the next evolution. Every time a GOOD PowerUp is collected it adds to your score. Every time a Bad PowerUp is collected it lessens your score. Every round of the game is more and more difficult. Every lower branch on the Goomba family tree is more difficult.

Will you survive?

name: Libertarian Wario Land

name: Dodge Spree X

They held you captive - Time to escape from this dreaded place!
You better get moving before they come to catch you.

name: Shoot & Destroy

Shoot & Destroy is a short modern 1-bit top-down shoot'em up.

An outer space threat is at large destroying and conquering the galaxy.
Fly through 4 stages and defeat the Boss.

name: Post Memory
description: You are a postman in a remote town. Slowly uncover the secrets that lies underneath the surface... or don't. The choice is in your hands.

name: Parasomnia: No REM
description: Parasomnia: no REM is a first-person psychological horror game that explores a theme never before seen in this genre: sleepwalking. This theme is represented through the duality between reality and the sleepwalking state, and their interaction with each other. The game’s mechanics and environments adopt characteristics of this type of sleep disorder, offering both innovative and terrifying gameplay.

name: Sokama
description:
Sokama is a Gameboy style platformer developed for GBJAM 12 and DINOJAM4.

66 Million Years Ago...

The sky had darkened and fire rained from above. Plants withered in what little light there was. Animals that didn't adapt, or turn on each other, fell as well. You are a small rodent-like mammal, separated from your family and trying your best to survive.

name: Giana Sisters: Project Radiant
description: A fangame for the unlikely run 'n' jump series Giana Sisters.

name: Cacho Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Deltatale
description: Have you ever wondered what would happen if Kris fell into the Underground instead of Frisk? Introducing DELTATALE, an alternate world where just that happens! This mod is aimed at players that have played Undertale, Deltarune, or UT Yellow and are looking for a new experience that implements lore and various upgrades from these games!

name: Undertale Yellow But Blue
description:
This game takes place in an AU in which Clover and Flo (An OC of the Integrity Soul) switch places. Go through all of Undertale Yellow with a twist.
That being using the blue soul mode throughout all battles.
Several pieces of dialogue and even some cutscenes have been changed.

name: Lydia's Labyrinth
description:
Lydia's Labyrinth is a "choose your own adventure" style visual novel, inspired by the classic old school game books such as the 'Fighting Fantasy' series.

Embark upon an odyssey through the Vampress' lair, seeking freedom, fortune, love, vengeance or even clues to your own origins!

name: Creta

name: Factor72
description: A puzzle game about multiplications

name: Ptolomaea

name: Regretful Ghosts
description: You play as a ghost whose friend is bored of being dead and asks you to find 3 mages who can complete a ritual that will bring the both of you back to life!

name: Neural Dominion
description: A brutal cyberpunk 4X turn-based strategy game with JRPG combat. Take control of one of 5 gangs in Technograd — a dark, crime-ridden city where getting to the top is the only thing that matters.

name: Valor & Blade
description:
Step into the shoes of a relentless warrior in this gripping action RPG. Your mission is to purge a dark, foreboding castle fortress of its evil inhabitants. Engage in intense, visceral sword battles and execute stealth kills as you navigate through shadowy corridors and towering battlements, each step bringing you closer to the heart of darkness.

As you progress, unlock powerful special abilities that enhance your combat prowess and strategic options. Whether it’s unleashing devastating attacks or summoning your inner strength, these abilities will be crucial in your quest to cleanse the fortress.

But that’s not all—hidden throughout the castle are legendary swords, each more powerful than the last. Discover these weapons to gain an edge over your enemies, making each encounter a test of skill and strategy.

With a variety of challenges to overcome and a level layout that changes with each playthrough, this game offers an immersive experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat. Are you ready to embrace the warrior’s path and obliterate the source of evil?

name: Corpus Pugna
description:
Once, there was a man of honour. Once, there was a council of four… The throbbing, twisting, sightless gods of he. Heroes and villains this man slaughtered in their name, and with his quarry’s blood exalted them.

He was their champion, and their warden. Their master, and their slave. Unable to command, they conveyed their will through pain.

Your champion has met his greatest foe. Join together, and let your righteous fists fly true!

name: Tell It Slant
description:
Caught between a forgotten friend and unseen threats, you must find the angle where the lies you’re told start to reflect the truth.
But do not fear. If you fail, we can start again from the beginning.

Tell It Slant is an intimate and layered parable exploring friendship, grief, and what is left behind when power is traded for belonging.

name: Treasures of Oz
description:
Developed by Family Entertainment and Published by World Of Games, this animated tale of the beloved classic has a new twist on an old favorite by having mini games to play throughout the story!

Starring Diana Ross as the Narrator, and animation voice legend Cam Clarke, star of over 50 cartoons, including Leonardo and Rocksteady of the 80's Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtle cartoon!

Strangely, all the lights are off, and the front door is open.

The situation worries you a bit, but you gather your courage—your uncle might be in danger.

You turn on your phone's flashlight and step inside..."

"La Ruota Della Sfortuna - Prima parte" is the first part of the game. It was created to participate in the ITALOCURSO Game Jam 2024."

name: Epiko Regal
description:
Epiko Regal is an immersive mobile strategy game that seamlessly blends collectible card gameplay with tower defense battles. Players build and upgrade their decks, which include a wide range of troops, spells, weapons, and buildings, all deployed strategically onto the battlefield. The objective is to defend your towers and engage in dynamic battles against other players to emerge victorious.

As part of the Web3 Gaming Ecosystem, called EPIKO, Epiko Regal offers unique benefits to holders of Epiko NFTs. Players who own these NFTs can claim exclusive in-game rewards, enhancing their gameplay experience. These rewards include rare items, special abilities, and access to exclusive content, helping NFT holders gain a competitive edge in the game.

In addition, Epiko Regal features Mystery Stones—special items that allow players to redeem valuable in-game content like Gems, Gold, higher-level cards, Digital Toys, and chapters from the Kathika Comics. These Mystery Stones can only be unlocked with a redeem code, which players receive when they purchase Epiko NFTs or win them during special events.

Explore the depths of Epiko's universe and unlock exclusive rewards with your Epiko NFTs.

name: Valbrace
description: No knight has ever survived the journey into Gnothrok keep. What makes you think you'll be any different?

name: Maple Forest
description:
Maple Forest is an action RPG inspired by a bunch of 90s classics. In it, you'll adventure across an island that's begun to sink for mysterious reasons. The residents of the island's main village tell you that their legends say the power of the god of the island is what keeps the island afloat.

The god of the island lives in a shrine at the top of the mountain, but that shrine has been sealed off by a huge stone door for longer than anyone in the village can remember. If there was a way to open that door and speak with the island's guardian, the island might be saved, but noone on the island has been strong or courageous enough to brave the island's wilderness in search of a way to unseal the door...until now!

name: 12 Labours of Hercules XVII: Feathered Fury
