name: Söldner-X Complete Collection
description: The Söldner-X Complete Collection is a compilation of two critically acclaimed shoot'em up games in one collection.

name: Tiny House Simulator
description: Manage your own tiny house building company in this open-world adventure. Create unique homes for clients, discover varied landscapes, and deliver your creations across the island. Upgrade your business, navigate picturesque routes, and immerse yourself in beautiful scenery.

name: And one day everything changed...
description:
A short visual novel about miracles, adventures, friendship, and love. A game for one warm, dreamy evening with a cup of tea and cookies. And at the end of the story, a small surprise awaits in the form of mini-platformers.

The game is based on the story "And one day everything will change..." by Sveta Sky.

name: Asylum of the Forsaken
description: Asylum of the Forsaken is a gripping horror survival game. Play as Nathan Scott, an investigative journalist exploring the abandoned Ravenwood Asylum. Search for clues, solve dark puzzles, and avoid a relentless entity. Uncover the asylum's terrifying secrets and survive the horrors in the shadows.

name: Viking Fish
description: An idle-fishing game played at the bottom of your screen, letting you multitask effortlessly. Progress by unlocking Vikings and upgrading their gear to fish for better loot, faster.

name: The Last Strand
description: The Last Strand is randomly generated twin stick shooter. You will play a pirate trying to escape a boat and seek vengeance, fighting enemies, helping NPC, discovering secrets and finding items.

name: Ashley: The One-Spell Mage
description: Union of skill with quick thinking. Group monsters, dodge their attacks, collect items, stun them, weaken them and finish them all off at once in this game that mixes action and strategy!

name: Nowa Online World
description: Nowa Online World is a mobile role-playing game about the war between human and orc developed by Nowa Games.

name: Luka Tim Incident
description: 3D Twitch meme themed horror game.

name: Kernel Hearts
description: Gather your allies. Eliminate Angels. Transform into a Magical Girl. Slay god. Kernel Hearts is a Multiplayer Co-Op Roguelike Action RPG about four magical girls and their attempt to save a world that's drowning in ashes

name: Water Delivery
description: Water Delivery is a first person, horror experience where you play as a water delivery boy. Ride along in the delivery truck from house to house. Deliver filled water jugs, find and return empty jugs, and collect all the payments. Will you be able to finish your final route of the evening?

name: Islamic Fun
description: Islamic Fun is a 1999 religious and educational video game, consisting of six minigames targeted at children. The game was developed by the United Kingdom-based firm Innovative Minds. The game is notable for its minigame "The Resistance" which allowed players to throw rocks at Israeli tanks upon correctly answering trivia.

name: Sonic Uprising
description: SONIC UPRISING is a 2D side-scrolling platform fan project led by bennascar and Team Giga-Drive. Uprising is inspired by the classic formula from the Mega Drive Era of Sonic the Hedgehog, expanding it by taking elements from various other titles in the series. The project's goal is to create a story inspired by SEGA's Sonic Forces, while also being able to tell a narrative that goes far beyond a simple reboot.

name: Pantufa the Cat: Extended Edition
description: Pantufa the Cat: Extended Edition (Pantufa the Cat 2 in Europe) is a modification of Sonic the Hedgehog for the SEGA Genesis / SEGA Mega Drive derived from a similar project from late 2011, Pantufa the Cat.

name: Pantufa the Cat
description: Sin descripción

name: Attack of the Mutant Camels '89
description: Sin descripción

name: Duelyst Origins
description: Duelyst Origins is a mix between a card game & board game. Play units, sling spells and equip artifacts to control the battlefield. Choose a faction and build custom decks, all cards are free!

name: The Final Exam
description: A game that raise awareness about gun violence and push for legislative reform by immersing players in the terrifying reality students face in America. The game highlights the horrors of gun violence and uses this shock factor as a call to action for meaningful change​ in real life.

name: Camp Buddy: Scoutmasters Season
description: Two Character Routes With multiple character choices and endings, you are in charge of the story! And all the choices you make in the game will affect how Yoshinori’s adventure will unfold! Each character route has an average of 25 full hours of gameplay! And that’s only for achieving one kind of ending! Unlock all endings to get the most out of the game! Get engaged with over 60+ unlockable CG Sets in the gallery for your own viewing pleasure! And that’s not to mention the more than 60+ mini images and background art! The game features 32 original compositions and fully-voiced cutscenes by various talented actors who help the player feel more connected to the characters and the story! Enjoy more than 30 hand-picked sex scenes throughout the game. See your favorite characters come to life in these intimate moments! Help Yoshinori recall events from his past alongside Hyunjin, and view special memories! You can also earn badges that you can use to unlock exciting content in the gallery! Finish the game once and unlock a secret room that lets you dress up the characters, view the opening video, and listen to in-game music! (Hint: The tent looks roomy)

name: Observation at Freddy's
description: Observation Duty meets Five Nights at Freddy's 1 with new mechanics and a revamped story! Fend off the animatronics while searching the cameras for anything out of place.

name: Color Vision Deficiency Test
description: Color Vision Deficiency Test is a screamer game by Liquid Generation, released in a series of Sabotage pranks, which is disguised as a color blindness test. The game acts as normal until the final question, in which a screamer featuring an image of Dr. Judith Kutter from the movie Basket Case is shown after the player clicks in the answer box.

Choose from teams around the globe and select a team to guide to glory, including a chance at the ultimate prize, the Stanley Cup.

name: EZ-Talk Shokyuuhen 1
description: The first entry in the EZ-Talk edutainment series for the Game Boy Advance. English phrases are spoken aloud by the character's mother, and the user follows those directions to complete minigames and tasks.

name: Mystic Mansion

But, while taking a shower, you ever have any thoughts of “Do I really exist?” or “What if, when I close my eyes, the world disappears?”...

name: Killer Chat
description: Killer Chat is a dark satire romance chatsim where you date serial killers. Pretend to be a serial killer, get inspiration for your book, fall in love, and try not to call the cops through a whirlwind six months with your murderous beau of choice. Who knows? You might find your happily ever after... or headline the news as a gruesomely lovesick corpse. It's honestly up to you.

name: A Purr Tale
description: A Purr Tale, a 20 minutes game where you live the life of a little cat at his home. Soon you realize that everything wasn't as well as he thought.

name: Summon: Joint Escape
description: Summon: Joint Escape is a cooperative horror survival game for 1-4 players. Find a way to escape from a stalker in camouflage uniform who wants to give you a piece of paper with the inscription "Summon".

name: Minimal Slide
description: Minimal Slide is a sliding puzzle game where you have to strategically move tiles to reach the goal in as few moves as possible. Beat levels of increasing difficulty and unlock ways to customize how the game looks and sounds!

name: Tanoshiku Omoshiroku Kanken Shougakusei
description:
A meaningful kanji learning software that can be used not only at home, but also at school.
The revision of the 2020 learning guidance increases the learning kanji from 1006 to 1026 (first for 30 years! ) , It is gaining attention on learning Chinese characters.
Certified by the Japanese Kanji Ability Certification Association, and responds to the latest past questions from Chinese Checkout Class 10 (about low - ending) to Class 2 (high school, university, and general usage). Incorporating the know-how of the previous Doraemon series has been infused with Chinese Character mini games.

name: Tactical Strike
description: Sin descripción

name: Monster Maker II: Uru no Hiken
description: Sin descripción

name: Black Russia
description: Sin descripción

name: Dead Cart
description: The fall was pretty bad. Your leg is definitely broken, but at least you escaped those things. And you've still got your gun. You've made it to the car park; there's a security guard's cart in the corner with the keys still in the ignition. You crawl into the seat and start it up. Now you can move faster, and hopefully escape.

name: Tokidoki Bosotto Russia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san Puzzle Party
description:
The first mobile game based on the 2024 anime Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings In Russian.
It's a puzzle game which uses characters and shots from the anime.

name: Backrooms: Spirits of the Forgotten
description: Escape the nightmare of the Backrooms—if you dare.

name: Kute Knight
description: A platform game where you control a knight who must collect coins and defeat monsters.

name: Marlow in Apocalyptic Acid World
description:
Marlow in Apocalyptic Acid World is a platform game for ZX Spectrum 128k, inspired by "The Great Giana Sisters." What? Did you think the inspiration came from a certain mustache plumber? No way…

Navigate this vast apocalyptic world by jumping, stomping on enemies, collecting crystals, and breaking blocks with your head across 4 worlds, totaling 16 levels and 5 Boss battles.

name: DCS World: MB-339
description: The MB-339 is a single engine, twin seat, Italian jet trainer and light ground support aircraft derived from the legendary MB-326 and designed during the Cold War. The aircraft entered service in the early 80's becoming the main training platform of the Italian Air Force.

name: 100 Hidden Kooky & Hiking Boots
description: Welcome to another kooky game series! Find 100 hidden silly characters with unusual behaviours on a BIG mountain scene & an additional 100 hidden hiking boots to complete the game. Also, play mini challenges to get help with your quest.

name: Frogs
description: Frogs is a clicker game where you tap to collect a variety of frogs. You can obtain them every 2 hours or unlock unique ones from chests that you can obtain by clicking. Equip frogs to boost your score, trade them in the marketplace, and just collect them all. Dive into this adventure with us!

name: deathwish
description: A melancholic tale set in a forest and you don't remember who you are. It comes with 5k words, 4 animated endings, and an endless love story.

name: Drown the Bride
description: Drown the Bride is a point 'n click adventure visual novel game about a young actress who must save her friend from going forward with a bad marriage before it's too late.

name: Tower of Madness
description: Tower of Madness is a linear psychological horror game where you play as a cowboy ascending an ominous floating upside down tower.

name: Inkshade
description: Inkshade is a turn-based tactics game carved out of strange wooden miniatures, wrapped in a web of locked rooms, and orchestrated by an otherworldly game master. Victory is not guaranteed, and the only constant is the cruel black ink that flows within the pieces.

name: Fisherman Simulator
description:
Forge your path through the islands—Hunt for sea animals and other resources to make a profit. Buy and upgrade boats and fishing gear, and sail across the seas!
Tags

name: Plants vs. Zombies Garden Warfare 2: Deluxe Upgrade
description: Sin descripción

name: NBA Jam: 1990's On Fire Edition
description: NBA JAM: 1990's On Fire Edition is a historical conversion mod of NBA JAM: On Fire Edition for PlayStation 3. It features every franchise's best teams of the 1990's (and 80's). Every team has accurate uniforms, courts and arenas, coaches, and logos.

name: Pup Panick!
description: PupTown is under attack! Help our hero defeat the enemies and guide him through this adventure!

name: Lamentations
description: You and your teammates are part of an elite undercover unit tasked with finding out information on a mysterious complex known as "the backrooms". Explore various locations, solve puzzles, check your six, and escape with your life!

name: 30XX: Feline Fury
description:
Suit up with Dally's mighty Catastrophe Armor and crush the competition! This DLC unlocks Dally for use in-game as a fully playable character a full suite of unique weapons.

Dally's 15 unique rapidfire Weapons restore NRG quickly for use with her versatile toolkit of 9 unique Powers while charging up toward one of her 8 new devastating Supers. Combined with her special Mod Bell upgrades, her arsenal is 30XX's most diverse toolkit yet!

name: Nine To Five (am)
description:
You know what’s worse than death? Working minimum wage.

A silly game about the horrors of working as a convenience store clerk.

The Boss wants YOU to cover your friend’s shift for a week. Help the customer with everything they need, or not! We don’t really care! Chatting with clients may be nice though.

name: Late Night Surfing
description: Tune in to TV straight from the dark dimension! But beware: not everything on TV is real. Late Night Surfing is a psychological horror visual novel. Demo was released on itchio on September 29, 2024.

name: Home is Where the Heart is
description:
'Home is Where the Heart is' (HiWtHi) is a survival horror visual novel in which the choices you make determine the fates of the three love interests.

You play as Doe (name and pronouns customisable), a person who has been trapped in this house for longer than you can remember. It's only when three uninvited guests arrive do you see your first hope of escape. But, whoever trapped you here doesn't treat your newfound friends as kindly as they do you.

Will you do all you can to help any of the LIs survive until the end? Or will you be the one to sabotage them, taking the side of your mysterious captor... who may be closer than you think?

name: Block Fortress 2
description: "Block Fortress 2" lets you build an impenetrable fortress in almost any way imaginable, then puts you in the action trying to defend it! Place walls, turrets, traps, and tons of other specialized defenses to build your base. Choose from dozens of guns and equipment, build an army, and join the fight to defend your stronghold! Put your skills as a builder, commander, and fighter to the test as you try to fend off the relentless enemies of the Blockverse!

name: Muv-Luv Unlimited: The Day After - Episode 02 Remastered
description: Muv Luv Unlimited: The Day After continues! The Shogun has come to Seattle, and with her, an installation that might solve the ongoing food crisis. But tensions simmer beneath the surface, as an unseen enemy waits for its chance to strike.

name: Muv-Luv Unlimited: The Day After - Episode 03 Remastered
description: The stakes grow higher in this latest episode of Muv Luv Unlimited: The Day After! The shadow of nuclear annihilation looms over mankind, as France places the city of Seattle in the crosshairs. Can humanity overcome this crisis and unite to face the BETA?

name: Rekindle
description:
Single, alone, and just plain miserable is not how most people would feel on their birthday, but it’s the sad reality for you. Refusing to have the day be a complete waste, you decide it's worth at least getting a cake for yourself.

Why is it that once you have the cake in hand, fate makes you walk past three incredibly important figures from your past?

What could this even mean for you?

name: WikiGame
description: In WikiGame, you navigate from a source and to a destination by clicking on WikiLinks.

name: Dark Light
description: Mio is a young girl surrounded by death, and after an unexpected accident, she finds out where people go after they die. Maybe Heaven, or Hell...or an Underworld full of demons and mysteries.

name: Divers
description:
Control Dylan, Orlok and Thyme as they explore the watery depths.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Elfazar's Hat
description:
Elfazar is hailed as a great magician, but his captive animals are ready to strike back!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Hyper Contender
description:
The daring, desperate, and indebted fight for money in the pits of Phogon.

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Kick Club
description:
Sports are fighting over over who is best! Let's all play together!

Game available on UFO 50.

name: Track Craft
description:
Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game that brings back the thrill of playing with toy cars,
with a twist. Build your own tracks, share them with friends, and race in a fully immersive
environment.
Players can race together in the same room, remotely, or on tracks created by others,
delivering a unique and dynamic experience. Immerse yourself in Mixed Reality (MR), where
your surroundings become part of the race, or switch to Virtual Reality (VR) for a classic,
high-speed thrill.
Developed primarily for Meta Quest 3, Track Craft has been praised by media, influencers,
and players during early access. The game is the debut title from Brainz Gamify, a creative
studio specializing in innovative mixed-reality games.

name: Office Crush Dating Simulator
description: A dating simulator where you romance your handsome co-workers and nothing goes wrong.

name: The Nile God
description: Take control of your very own ancient Egyptian civilization in The Nile God. Start with nothing in a world where resources are scarce and find a way to survive and allow your small city to turn into the largest civilization Cairo has ever seen.

name: Hocus Opus
description:
Short visual novel created for the Spooktober 6th Annual Visual Novel Jam.

In this game you will be able to meet different creatures from the imagination world, as well as their struggles. The good news are that, since tonight is Halloween and you are the one deciding how the story goes, you might be able to help them.

name: Ninth Day Memorial
description: Your friend has died and you have to time-travel in order to save them. Except you don't really want to. And something goes wrong in the process.

name: The Stars Under Lockehurst
description:
The Stars Under Lockehurst is a romantic supernatural mystery visual novel about a grad student visiting their friend in the small coastal town, Cape Lockehurst. Here, they unravel the mysteries behind recent disappearances and peculiar happenings around town.

Inspired by H.P. Lovecraft’s Call of Cthulhu and similar works, this game explores fear of the unknown and the unknowable, featuring a cast of unique, romanceable characters (who just might be a little... fishy).

name: Seaside Drive
description: It's time for Pilot to return to what he does best -- Flying the Campanella through deep space!

name: Star Waspir
description: You are an elite member of the Star Wasps. Pilot your ship and battle the incoming swarm!

name: Vainger
description: The Vainger returns to Io and finds itself betrayed. The enemy must be found and eradicated.

name: Warptank
description: Use your tank to regain control of the station and sever all ties to Capsule world!

name: Pilot Quest
description: Sin descripción

name: Overbold
description: In the notorious red arena, the more risk you take, the more money you make!

name: Party House
description: Can you throw the best house party of the summer without getting busted?

name: Onion Delivery
description: Can you survive the work-week in Zorrg city? Do your best to make deliveries amidst the chaos!

name: Tornado Mania! 3D
description: Triple Game of the Year winner now in 3D! A mad scientist unleashes his Tornado Machine on the world! Engulf and relocate buildings to create your own utopian city, or simply choose to destroy everything in your path!

name: Epic Empire
description: Prepare for the ultimate tower defense experience in Epic Empire - Tower Defense! Will you answer the call to defend the kingdom and become the legendary hero the realm needs? Command an array of powerful heroes and strategic towers to defeat the forces of evil and protect your kingdom!

name: Veil Transfer
description: An atmospheric, arcade first-person horror game where your sole job is to root out the Veils who take on the identity of humans. Interrogate and execute monsters that hide within people, and protect yourself while managing your ammunition and transfers.

name: The Thirst Road
description: Travel between cities and trade resources in this short desert-themed game. Your goal is to earn 1,000 gold within 30 days.

name: Mini & Max
description: Mini and her dog Max are locked in the storage room. Harness the magic of shrinking to escape!

name: SpongeBob SquarePants
description: SpongeBob SquarePants is an educational game developed for the Fisher-Price iXL Learning System.

name: Mortol II
description: How many will have to sacrifice their lives to save Mortolia yet again?

name: Rock On! Island
description: Rally your cavemen and defend your cave from waves of attacking dinosaurs.

name: The Big Bell Race
description: Do you have what it takes to become the Big Bell Race champion?

name: iQuest Math: Grade 5
description: iQuest Math: Grade 5 is an educational math game released for the LeapFrog iQuest handheld system.

name: iQuest Math: Grades 6-8
description: iQuest Math: Grades 6-8 is an educational math game released for the LeapFrog iQuest handheld system. It is a continuation of iQuest Math: Grade 5 for ages 11-14.

name: iQuest Science: Grade 5
description: iQuest Science: Grade 5 is an educational science game released for the LeapFrog iQuest handheld system targeted towards kids aged 10-11.

name: iQuest Science: Grades 6-8
description: iQuest Science: Grades 6-8 is an educational science game released for the LeapFrog iQuest handheld system targeted towards kids aged 11-14.

name: iQuest Starter Pack Cartridge
description: iQuest Starter Pack Cartridge is a game bundled in with the LeapFrog iQuest handheld system.

name: Football Quiz 2024
description: Sin descripción

name: iQuest Social Studies: Grades 6-8
description: iQuest Social Studies: Grades 6-8 is an educational game based around social studies released for the LeapFrog iQuest handheld system targeted towards kids aged 11-14.

name: iQuest Social Studies: Grade 5
description: iQuest Social Studies: Grade 5 is an educational game based around social studies released for the LeapFrog iQuest handheld system targeted towards kids aged 10-11.

name: Arcade Archives: Moon Shuttle
description:
"Moon Shuttle" is a shooter released by Nichibutsu in 1981.
Players can enjoy alternating stages in which they destroy or dodge through groups of meteors to reach the goal, and stages in which they defeat enemies with wave motion cannons.

name: Tearscape
description:
Discover a Gothic world in this 2D top-down action-adventure, blending fast-paced combat, exploration, and pixel art inspired by Game Boy Color classics. Fight monstrous foes, unlock new abilities, and explore a non-linear map filled with hidden secrets and dangerous challenges.

Master precise combat, where every strike and dodge matters. Strategically manage your stamina by carefully considering each move as you face off against grotesque enemies. You have a limited number of healing flasks—use them wisely and plan your moments to recover carefully. Upgrade your character's stats to remain effective and competitive in combat.

Discover powerful items hidden in the dungeons that enhance both combat and exploration. Unlock new abilities to defeat enemies more effectively and access hidden paths, uncovering deeper secrets within the world.

Uncover hidden dungeons throughout Tearscape's dark, interconnected world. Each dungeon holds unique challenges, powerful items, and deadly enemies, pushing your combat and exploration skills to the limit.

Face off against challenging bosses—massive, grotesque creatures born from dark experiments. Each encounter demands precise timing, strategy, and mastery of your abilities to emerge victorious.

Explore the vast, interconnected map filled with branching paths, hidden shortcuts, and secret areas. The non-linear design encourages exploration, rewarding you with powerful items and new abilities.

Encounter a diverse cast of NPCs, some offering guidance, others seeking your help, and a few with their own hidden agendas. Every interaction adds depth to the story.

name: V Bomb
description: Sin descripción

name: Smily Angry
description: Sin descripción

name: Pin Climb
description: Sin descripción

name: B Math
description:
B MATH is a fast-paced one-button game.

Your goal is to select which one of the five numbers is the correct for the equation. You have limited time for your answer. The faster you answer, the more points you'll score. After every correct answer you get a score multiplier. After every incorrect answer, you lose some time.

The game will end when the time runs out.

name: Laser Fortress
description: Sin descripción

name: Devil Mail
description:
Devil Mail is a short 3D platform adventure created in fancade. You must find a way to access the castle and deliver an important message to the king, a message from a very far away place...
It can be played directly in the fancade app, or from itch.io

name: Pieces of me
description: Pieces of me is a psychological thriller drama in the genre of "walking simulator", which is a spin-off to the game "September 7th"

name: Babel Defender
description: Build your tower during the day. Reach 100 floors to reach the heavens, from where the Almighty dominates you. But at night, fear the lightning wrath of God who wants to punish your insolence and defend your tower at all costs!

name: Gaiadon: Eternal Quest
description: An idle/incremental RPG

name: Jumfrog
description: Leap to Freedom! Guide a frog prince on an epic journey out of a deep, dark well in this challenging platformer. Every jump counts as you slingshot the frog with precision through tough obstacles. Can you conquer the fear of failure and find the light at the top?

name: Lost Key: The Path of Illumination
description: An ancient order that protects a secret, kept hidden for centuries. An unexpected crime that causes you to be accused of the murder of a friend. Solve the mysteries and puzzles of a story full of esotericism to prove the truth about your innocence and hold the real murderer responsible.

name: Hell's Descent
description: Start your roguelite adventure and dive into the depths of Hell's Descent. Play as one of three elemental sorceresses, you must survive the relentless enemies of hell. Unlock upgrades, discover powerful artifacts, and refine your skills.

name: Turbo Live
description: Turbo Live is the ultimate party game for your Twitch community. Save the pedestrians or crush them through the chat. Play in co-op or versus mode. Grow your audience, have fun, and build connections during chaotic and unforgettable sessions!

name: Artemis Lutea: District Defender
description: A Ace Attorney fan game, with seasoned defence attorney; Artemis Lutea!
